title: [K-12] Development of Critical Flexibility-Based Instructional Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic instructional design theories and mathematics curriculum development
context.additional_context: Strengthening design competencies through critical reflection activities in a digital platform environment enabling personalized learner feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze implicit assumptions in various instructional design theories and perform critical reviews
Learners can develop and apply at least three flexible instructional design strategies tailored to mathematics contexts
Learners can reflectively evaluate problem situations encountered during design processes and derive improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
